sentences.sContent: Ahmed then took me for a drive outside Turpan to a small Uyghur village at the foot of a mountain where I could see their style of housing, farming, etc.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ahmed then took me for a drive outside Turpan to a small Uyghur village at the foot of a mountain where I could see their style of housing, farming, etc.
sentences.sCn: 然后，艾哈迈德载我去吐鲁番郊外的、山脚下的一个维族小村庄，在那我可以看到他们的建筑风格，以及农事等等。
